name: Cut The Fruits (Version 2)
description:
Just quickly move your finger on a fruit to cut it in half.

You can also use your mouse to cut, by keeping the left button pressed while moving  the mouse quickly on top of a fruit.

If a fruit touches the  floor, you loose one life point.

A score value and a best score value have been added compare version 1.

Game over is triggered when life level reaches -1

:-)
